text: Andrew James Wright (born 21 October 1978) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger. ==Career== Born in Leeds, Wright played for Leeds United, Reading, Fortuna Sittard, Harrogate Town, SV Meerssen, Scarborough, Droylsden, Whitby Town, Bradford Park Avenue, Wakefield & Emley, Sutton Town, Stocksbridge Park Steels, Worksop Town, Leigh RMI, Blyth Spartans, Newcastle Blue Star and Harrogate Railway Athletic. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English footballers Category:Leeds United F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Fortuna Sittard players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:SV Meerssen players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:Droylsden F.C. players Category:Whitby Town F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Wakefield F.C. players Category:Ashfield United F.C. players Category:Stocksbridge Park Steels F.C. players Category:Worksop Town F.C. players Category:Leigh Genesis F.C. players Category:Blyth Spartans A.F.C. players Category:Newcastle Blue Star F.C. players Category:Harrogate Railway Athletic F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Eredivisie players Category:Association football wingers Category:English expatriate footballers Category:English expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Andy Wright (footballer)
